name: Cemetery Warrior V
description:
Cemetery Warrior V

is the sequel to the crazy shooter Cemetery Warrior. The lord of hell was defeated, but the astral worlds do not recognize the new king - Zexus. Powerful masters of the worlds challenge the demon and are going to destroy it with the help of hordes of their minions.

Once again, immerse yourself in a crazy 3D first-person action game, controlling the Demon Zexus. The new part has acquired many innovations:
- Improved graphics;
- New bosses;
- Special attacks;
- Special secret places filled with treasure chests and diamonds; and most importantly-the development of demonic skills that you will improve as you progress through the game.


Your demon is capable of many things:
- Instantly navigate through the level;
- Emit a demonic roar that paralyzes enemies;
- Super attack literally drives enemies into the ground, instantly destroying them.
- There are also a number of passive skills that will help you survive.

Combine the firepower with the demonic abilities of Zexus to break through hordes of enemies and defeat giant bosses.

Several hours of hurricane gameplay under the explosive heavy metal and 3 levels of difficulty for any type of player.

And, yes, bro - don't forget about Headshots!
